data.actual_result: Logs are completely gone, until you restart Discord (it fixes by itself sometimes).
data.short_description: Filters by Action does not show any logs at times. (May require you to test it multiple times).
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log, then filter it to action that has logs. - Observe. If this doesn't happen the first time, restart discord, and go to another server's audit log (it helped me reproduce it when I went to other server's log).
